img_summary: The image depicts a snowy forest scene from a video game. A character is shown running through the snow, holding a weapon. In the background, there is a large pagoda-like structure partially visible through the trees. The image includes an overlay indicating that the player has collected "Gentian x2." A red arrow points towards a specific area in the scene, likely highlighting a point of interest or a path to follow.
